name: Chop Chop (PC)
description:
Mobile Version: https://lildyll.itch.io/chop-chop-mobile

Use your arrow keys or WASD to move your lumberjack around the field. Dash into logs to cut them by pressing 'Shift.' You can dash every 2 seconds but it resets if you cut a log. See how long you can last and how many logs you can cut before there's too much!
This was made in 3 hours for Trijam 212 with the theme "Too Much."
